ValidationRule.description: Validation that when record type=GDC Tech issue and classification is not one of below throw validation error
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.DeveloperName ='Serv_GDC_Tech_Issue', NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Auto-COMM'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Datalink'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Flight Planning'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Internal'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'MyGDC'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Other'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Skyconnect'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Weather'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'WINN (XM/EFB)'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'ICAO 2012'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Flight Bag Pro'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'Scheduling'), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c ,'') )), $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Select the appropriate values(Auto-COMM','Datalink' ,'Flight Planning' ,'Internal' ,'MyGDC' ,'Other' ,'Skyconnect' ,'Weather' ,'WINN', 'ICAO 2012' ,'Flight Bag Pro','Scheduling')
